overview:
Guillermo is deeply involved within the Venture Capital industry in Spain. He has been the Head for Spain of the European Investment Fund, which is the largest Fund of Funds in Europe investing in VC.

Former member of the Advisory Board in several VC Funds (Adara, Bullnet, Spinnaker, Debaeque), he has also led a â‚¬ 183mm Fund of Funds in Spain.

He has also been Head of a â‚¬ 60mm VC Fund, with direct investments including Kelkoo.com, Mundoviaje.com, Safelayer and Molinare.

Previously a member of PwC Corporate Finance team in Madrid, with special focus on Technology companies.
